item.title: Example of creating a post through GitHub.com
item.description:
This post was created from the github.com website using the pull request system.

Latex equations are rendered by MathJax and can be inserted like so:

\begin{equation*} (\lambda + \mu)\nabla(\nabla\cdot\mathbf{u}) + \mu\nabla^2\mathbf{u} - \rho \partial_t^2 \mathbf{u} = - \mathbf{f} \end{equation*}

or inline like \(\mathbf{u} = (u_x, u_y, y_z)\) .
